fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Research and development, Public Health, Health, Food Safety, Agriculture, Institutional, Parliament, Commission and Council. ICCI main focus in EU policies: clinical and basic research, patient advocacy, medical informatics, the creation of product safety protocols such as quality control/quality assurance standards and laboratory analysis for the cultivation, manufacturing and distribution of wide variety of cannabis products.
goals__remit:
A collaborative project of non-profit, for-profit and government institutions, ICCI is an international research and educational hub designed to meet the needs of the global market. ICCI offers an array of services that includes CRO services, agricultural sciences, product development, product safety certification, and government relations. 
Main focus: clinical and basic research, direct patient advocacy, legislative,efforts and studies, government relations, advisory and administration, medical informatics, the creation of product safety protocols such as quality control/quality assurance standards and laboratory analysis for the cultivation, manufacturing 
and distribution of cannabis products.ICCI identifies, coordinates and supports global research priorities for the advancement of cannabis and cannabinoid treatments through a multidiscipline, evidence-based approach that incorporates innovative tools and methods.
